project.name: C-C089C-SUBV-03-ST04-DT04-DF15-CF22-01
project.description: Creating test case using base program. Added an environment variable read to get a key in order to read in data from shared memory. Completed injection.

iopair.name: C-C089C-SUBV-03-ST04-DT04-DF15-CF22-01-GOOD-01
iopair.description: create a repository Good inputs: 1) name of shipper for use in Sql databaseBad inputs:SQL argument injection

process.script: nohup shm_setup -k 6786 -s 73 -m "shipper1" -o /opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.id > /opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.out 2>&1 & echo $! > /opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.pid && echo "Shared memory created"
sleep 2 && printf "Sleeping to allow DB to be created."

if [[ -f "/opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.pid" ]]; then killtree.sh -s 9 -p $(cat "/opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.pid") && echo "Killed shared memory server."; else echo "Failed: Shared memory server PID file does not exist."; fi

if [[ -f "/opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.id" ]]; then ipcrm -m $(cat "/opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.id") && echo "Deleted shared memory segment."; else echo "Failed: Shared memory ID file does not exist."; fi

scoring_formula.formula: STDOUT AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT

iopair.name: C-C089C-SUBV-03-ST04-DT04-DF15-CF22-01-GOOD-02
iopair.description: commit a file Good inputs: 1) name of shipper for use in Sql databaseBad inputs:SQL argument injection

process.script: nohup shm_setup -k 6786 -s 73 -m "NewShipper" -o /opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.id > /opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.out 2>&1 & echo $! > /opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.pid && echo "Shared memory created"
sleep 2 && printf "Sleeping to allow DB to be created."
cd ../good-02 && cp file.txt stonesoup && cd stonesoup && $SS_TC_DEPS/bin/svn add file.txt

if [[ -f "/opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.pid" ]]; then killtree.sh -s 9 -p $(cat "/opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.pid") && echo "Killed shared memory server."; else echo "Failed: Shared memory server PID file does not exist."; fi

if [[ -f "/opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.id" ]]; then ipcrm -m $(cat "/opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.id") && echo "Deleted shared memory segment."; else echo "Failed: Shared memory ID file does not exist."; fi

scoring_formula.formula: CHECKOUT AND ADD AND COMMIT AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT
